product_name: Swix CH6 Blue Hydrocarbon Glide Wax - 180g
long_description: The Classic CH6 Blue Hydrocarbon Glide wax is perfect when the temperature plummets. Wax formula contains some synthetic wax, making it durable in aggressive snow and ice. Wax offers base protection and great glide. Recommend iron temperature setting is 140degF. CH6 Blue wax is rated for 10degF to 21degF conditions.
short_description: The Classic CH6 Blue Hydrocarbon Glide wax is perfect when the temperature plummets.
